content.question: Which of the following best explains why the code segment does not work as intended?

choices.label: In the for loop header, the initial value of j should be 0.
In the for loop header, the initial value of j should be 2.
The for loop condition should be j < fibs.length - 1.
The for loop condition should be j < fibs.length + 1.

content.answer: In the for loop header, the initial value of j should be 2.

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
